The '''Thousand Hands Manipulation Force''' is a technique which is used through the puppet of the [[Third Kazekage (puppet)|Third Kazekage]].

== Usage ==
From the Third Kazekage puppet's left arm opens several compartments. These compartments are prepared with summoning [[Enclosing Technique|seals]] in them, which [[Unsealing Technique|call forth]] a large number of long puppet arms that can bend and follow the opponent, then crush them with devastating force. The arms are modified with launchers, which can emit poison gas, binding wires with a kunai-anchor, or regular kunai. Sasori can detach the entire left arm (with the thousand arms) to regain mobility for the puppet, and a [[Puppet Buzzsaw|buzzsaw]] takes its place.
